subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: New drivers, a potential power shift to Toyota and perhaps a return to form by Dale Earnhardt Jr. will be some of the story lines in an ever-changing Nascar in 2008.
snippet: New drivers, a potential power shift to Toyota and perhaps a return to form by Dale Earnhardt Jr. will be some of the story lines in an ever-changing Nascar in 2008.
